alert.note: Alert for Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 09 at 3:43AM CST until February 09 at 4:15AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN WHITE...NORTHEASTERN POPE...SALINE...HAMILTON AND NORTHWESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 342 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Thompsonville to near Harrisburg to 11 miles northwest of Rosiclare, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eldorado, Mcleansboro, Equality, Ridgway and Norris City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
